## Welcome !

I am a full professor of Strucural Mechanics and Acoustics at the Laboratoire de Mécanique des structures et des Systèmes Couplés ([LMSSC](https://www.lmssc.cnam.fr/)) of [Le Cnam](https://www.cnam.fr/) in Paris.

I am an enthusiastic and avid user of the Typst ![](assets/images/typst_logo.png){width=5mm} markup language and the Julia ![](assets/images/julia.svg){width=5mm} programming language (don't worry, I also like ![](assets/images/python.svg){width=5mm} and ![](assets/images/matlab.png){width=5mm}!).


::: {layout-ncol=2}
